name: TiktaalikDreamings Realistic Weapon Pack
description:
Intended to add some vaguely more realistic weapons from history instead of the very fantasy cliche things in the game.  Weights will be lower, in some cases by a lot, and fatigue use will be lower as well.  But those will be offset by damage reductions.  Grotesque oversized weapons make little sense vs humans, but those fantasy weapons have a use vs dragons after all.
At the moment contains only a single handed 12-13th century arming sword and a later greatsword based on the Gallowglass mercenary styles.
author: Tiktaalik Dreaming
